title: 生产统计
text:
Preface
这是一本公司生产数据可视化书.

title: 1  Introduction
text:
This is a book created from markdown and executable code.
See 樊志伟 (2026) for additional discussion of literate programming.

1 + 1

[1] 2






樊志伟. 2026. “生产统计.” Comput. J. 27 (2): 97–111. https://doi.org/10.1093/comjnl/27.2.97.

title: 2  产量
text:
2.2 产量月趋势

p<-pivot_longer(product, cols = 2:11, names_to ="产品",values_to = "产量")
p %>%  group_by(产品) %>% e_charts(月份)  %>%  e_bar(产量)  %>% e_facet(rows=5,cols=2) %>% e_tooltip()

title: 6  甲烷化催化剂体积分布
crumbs: 6  甲烷化催化剂体积分布

objectID: 甲烷化.html#一期c103催化剂分布
href: 甲烷化.html#一期c103催化剂分布
title: 6  甲烷化催化剂体积分布
text:
6.2 一期C103催化剂分布

#| message: false
#| warning: false
#| echo: false
library(tidyverse)
library(echarts4r)
url<-'D:\\华为家庭存储\\编程\\R语言\\svg\\绘图3.svg'
svg<-url %>% readLines() %>% paste0(collapse = "")
df_103<-data.frame(name=c('50瓷球','上部25瓷球','柱状催化剂','四叶草催化剂','10瓷球','下部25瓷球'),value=c(1.81,1.2,5,14.5,1.81,14.7))
df_103 %>% arrange(value) %>%  e_charts(name, elementId = "CHART") %>% e_svg_register('svg', svg) %>% e_geo(map='svg',left=10,right='50%',selectedMode='multiple', blur=FALSE, emphasis=list(focus='self',itemStyle=list(color=NULL))) %>% e_grid(left='30%',top='20%',bottom='20%') %>% e_bar(value,x_index=1,y_index=1) %>% e_flip_coords() %>% e_on( list(seriesIndex=0), "function (event) { let c = get_e_charts('CHART'); c.dispatchAction({ type: 'highlight', geoIndex: 0, name: event.name }); }",event='mouseover') %>% e_on(list(seriesIndex=0), "function (event) { let c = get_e_charts('CHART'); c.dispatchAction({ type: 'downplay', geoIndex: 0, name: event.name }); }",event='mouseout') %>% e_labels(position='inside')  %>% e_title(text='一期C103瓷球、催化剂体积')
crumbs: 6  甲烷化催化剂体积分布
